title: Bel-vedére, or, The Garden of the muses
author: Bodenham, John, fl. 1600.
notes: Compiled by John Bodenham--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Contains Shakespeare allusions--Cf. Ingleby, The Shakespeare allusion book, I: 72-73 and II: 478, 489-518.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
